about_the_game:
When you own a car like this one you know you've really arrived. Most likely, right on the top step of the podium. Obviously, we are talking about Corvette Stingray Convertible 2014, a sports car with an unmistakable design.

But this jewel on four wheels is not just aesthetics and appearances: this Corvette is as beautiful as it is fast. Engineered for the road, on the track it will unleash the full power of its V8 engine and its 450 hp, leaving all its opponents behind.
Feel cool with the hottest car around and cross the finish line with Corvette Stingray Convertible 2014. Add it to your collection now!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 2
detailed_description:
When you own a car like this one you know you've really arrived. Most likely, right on the top step of the podium. Obviously, we are talking about Corvette Stingray Convertible 2014, a sports car with an unmistakable design.

But this jewel on four wheels is not just aesthetics and appearances: this Corvette is as beautiful as it is fast. Engineered for the road, on the track it will unleash the full power of its V8 engine and its 450 hp, leaving all its opponents behind.
Feel cool with the hottest car around and cross the finish line with Corvette Stingray Convertible 2014. Add it to your collection now!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 2

package_groups.title: Buy HOT WHEELS™ - Corvette Stingray Convertible 2014

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K / AMD FX-6350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 / GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-5820K / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: When you own a car like this you know you've really arrived ... on the top step of the podium. A convertible with an unmistakable design, as beautiful as it is fast. Feel cool with the hottest car around and unleash all its power!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean
